text: Where indeed? Megan Thomas spoke sharply to the conductor, demanding an ex But out of depth in this particular instance. Fingered his ticket-punch nervously. Peered out of the window. Went and consulted the driver. "Where are we going? he echoed Cadwallader. "Damned if I know, boy," said the driver. "But something very untoward has happened, if you ask me.".
